name: The Mountain (Begüm Hüner)
description:
The Mountain is a First Person Adventure/Story based game about the adventure of a shapeshifter kid who tries to find his lost friend, Dr. Badger. In his journey, he will find the truth about himself, his family and Dr. Badger.

We are from Bahcesehir University and The Mountain is our graduation project. We developed this game in 3 months and we hope you will like it!
